preqs: (FIT9123 or FIT5123 or FIT9006 or equivalent) or (MGX5962 and three of (ACF5903, BTF5903, ECF5953, ETF5900, MGF5020, MGF5030, MGX5991, MGX5992 or MKX5955))

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {3341.2, 3343} Do true Otherwise (Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {FIT5123, FIT9006, FIT9123} OR  (Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGX5962} and  Must have passed 3 (I/W) units in {ACF5903, BTF5903, ECF5953, ETF5900, MGF5020, MGF5030, MGX5991, MGX5992, MKX5955} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}))

description: The unit provides students with an overview of enterprise systems and is designed to describe the role of enterprise systems as part of the larger IT infrastructure within large scale organisations. A case study approach will be adopted which will focus on inherent issues surrounding management and deployment of enterprise systems, together with implementation issues influencing the impact of these systems on the organisation. SAP ECC6 will be the software of choice to introduce students to the complexity of enterprise resource planning systems through tutorial workshops.
